title: how's this guy a silver 5?

embed.description: Check your Summoner statistics, MMR, realtime spectate and using powerful global LoL Charts!

body:
http://oce.op.gg/summoner/league/userName=aranel%20elenesar
he lost every ranked game he ever played, even in placements.
Care to explain to me why he's put into silver 5?
He should be bronze 5 for all i know because he's ruinning the game. He's been put into games with people that have higher mmr than him

replies.body:
Maybe he was boosted by his friend???
Feel sad 4 dat friend doe

Wait up i found someone:
Gabberkinglad and 'Aranel Elenesar' both have been partying up together.
They both are in Silver this season, and last. So there :P

ye but still lost EVERY single placement game and still placed in silver 5? when i was in placement i won 6 out of 10 and ended up in bronze 1.
How's this possible? How could Riot thinks this is a good placement for him?
I'd tell you how, but unfortunately OP.GG is down for mains.

Did you check out Season 3?
It's got some really nice stats!
Also did you ever think that the account was bought?

Well i can tell you really easily then, he was higher then Silver last season (Read, he was gold) and just isn't this season.

I bet you either played ranked last season and were bronze, or only started ranked this season.
last season's rank influence this season's rank? There's no way that person can be in gold last season, unless it's being played by some other person

On the page it says:
Silver Season 2 AND Silver Season 3.

Riot Games compare to how 'well' you did in the previous season, so they have a better understanding of where to put you.
I think this guy just got to Silver 5 (just), because of the last seasons being in Silver an all.
There is also another way!
If you 'build' up your way in normals, your 'Normal Match Making Rating' is raised, thus making you more eligible to vs higher tiers, here you give Riot a rough idea of where you should be put in Ranked. <------- Do remember this is a theory, not an actual thing.

I GAVE IT A TRY PEOPLE!
